== All-Staff Meetings ==
[http://www.cnrm.meteo.fr/aladin/spip.php?rubrique25&lang=en All-Staff Meetings (2007-present)]:  ALADIN maintain a web page with link to Joint ''ALADIN Workshop/HIRLAM All-Staff'' meetings

== ''Model'' Meetings ==
[wiki:HirlamMeetings/ModelMeetings Model Meetings]: Meetings related to HARMONIE/ALADIN/ARPEGE/IFS model development

== '''Organizational Meetings''' ==
[wiki:HirlamMeetings/OrganisationalMeetings Organisational Meetings]: HIRLAM organisational meetings including MG and joint MG/CSSI meetings (2006-2008) and  Member institute visits (2006-2007)

== '''Principal Steering Body Meetings''' ==
[wiki:HirlamMeetings/SteeringbodyMeetings Steering Body Meetings]:  HIRLAM Steering Body meetings including HIRLAM Council, ALADIN General Assembly and HIRLAM Advisory Committee/ ALADIN Policy Advisory Committee meetings (2006/2007)
